reviewText: Very good video very informative. We are putting it to good practice
excellent DVD. although very instructional it is also very arousing to watch with your significant other. Highly recommend
Jaiya, I loved you before success took over.

In polite society, the topic of anal massage is rarely aired openly. This is an unfortunate fact, in the end. As anyone knows who has explored anal eroticism, it don't get better than this. The joys of the female anus have not received the praise it deserves, but with the release of this DVD, things once hidden are FINALLY coming to light. However, I have yet to find a good movie on analingus. Butt-munching is another hidden and neglected topic in our uptight world. Until then, we fans of rectal romance will have to settle for fine films such as these to enlighten otherwise dark subjects.
Very informative. I learned a lot and it helped me to applied the new techniques that I learned. I definitely recommend it!

While we were writing "Anal Sex for Couples," Lori and I watched a dozen massage DVDs and tested the instructions. We recommended some in the book but this one hadn't come out yet. I will recommend it now.

The models are attractive, the action is erotic and the techniques are pleasing. As for "hot," yes, it is. My primary regret is that the film is only 35 minutes long. That's enough to teach a novice but might not satisfy an experienced couple.

For a more expanded explanation of anal massage, I recommend "Anal Massage for Relaxation and Pleasure." The models are not as attractive but the instructor is a certified therapist and the techniques are more advanced.
